thread.title: IDT to Present at Upcoming Investor Conferences in New York
thread.title_full: IDT to Present at Upcoming Investor Conferences in New York

author: admin
title: IDT to Present at Upcoming Investor Conferences in New York
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Integrated Device Technology, Inc. 
SAN JOSE, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Integrated Device Technology, Inc. (IDT ® ) (NASDAQ: IDTI) today announced that members of the senior management team will present to the investment community at the following investor conferences: Citi Global Technology ConferenceDate: Tuesday, September 8, 2015Time: 2:45 pm ETLocation: Hilton New York Hotel, New York, NY Credit Suisse Small & Mid Cap ConferenceDate: Wednesday, September 16, 2015Time: 9:30 am ETLocation: The Waldorf Astoria, New York, NY 
A live audio webcast of the Citi Global Technology Conference presentation will be available on the “Investor Relations” section of IDT’s website at http://ir.idt.com/ . An archived replay of the webcast will be available following the live presentation. The Credit Suisse Small & Mid Cap Conference will not be webcast as the event sponsor is not making a webcast available of this event. 
About IDT 
Integrated Device Technology, Inc. develops system-level solutions that optimize its customers’ applications. IDT uses its market leadership in timing, serial switching and interfaces, and adds analog and system expertise to provide complete application-optimized, mixed-signal solutions for the communications, computing and consumer segments. Headquartered in San Jose, Calif., IDT has design, manufacturing, sales facilities and distribution partners throughout the world. IDT stock is traded on the NASDAQ Global Select Stock Market® under the symbol “ IDTI .” Additional information about IDT is accessible at www.IDT.com . Follow IDT on Facebook , LinkedIn , Twitter , YouTube and Google+ . IDT and the IDT logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Integrated Device Technology, Inc. All other brands, product names and marks are or may be trademarks or registered trademarks used to identify products or services of their respective owners.
